title: Cancer Institute
creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson and Cine Service Productions
brief_description: The Peter MacCallum hospital is one of the most advanced cancer treatment centres in the world. As well as tracing its history, this film shows aspects of work being done by various sections of the hospital.
